home.description: Welcome to a place where astronomy enthusiasts unite to share their observations and insights. Connect with fellow stargazers and explore the wonders of the universe together.
home.aboutTitle: Join a vibrant community of astronomy enthusiasts and share your passion.
home.aboutText: Our platform connects astronomy amateurs from around the world, allowing you to share observations, insights, and experiences. Discover new perspectives and enhance your knowledge in a supportive environment.

features.communityText: Share your discoveries and learn from others.
features.exploreText: Engage with fellow stargazers and expand your horizons.

home.galleryText: Join a vibrant community of astronomy enthusiasts. Share your observations and insights.

galleryCard1.title: Share Your Astronomical Observations
galleryCard1.text: Easily upload and showcase your celestial findings.

galleryCard2.title: Engage with Fellow Astronomy Lovers
galleryCard2.text: Comment on observations and exchange ideas.

galleryCard3.title: Create Your Unique User Profile
galleryCard3.text: Personalize your experience and connect with others.

creator.title: Our Dearest Creator
creator.description: Passionate space enthusiast building a welcoming community
creator.name: Olesia Shevchenko
creator.quote: Olesia has always been obsessed with the stars, so naturally, she just had to drag you into it too.

callToAction.title: Join Our Astronomy Community
callToAction.subtitle: Share your celestial observations and connect with fellow astronomy enthusiasts today!

subscription.title: Want to contribute to the Cosmorum?
subscription.text: If you would like to become or are a member of our stellar community, and have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact us. We will appreciate any help in improving the Cosmorum, baby!
subscription.copyHint: Feel free to copy the address and write us anytime.
